messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

service now filtering issue re filtering issue hello could you please assist with below thank you kind regards specialist en ext sent friday filtering issue hi want create list contains changes requests incidents problem tasks active closed canceled rolled back assigned noticed issue when try create list by filtering out want display filter out canceled changes creates condition with closed incomplete filters out some incidents awaiting info please log ticket with appropriate regards engineer managed en
